version_description: Fixed bug of keyboard with iOS8

Now EC Touch is compatible with Pioneer AppRadio One!

***WARNING***
Any video services will be available on AppRadio One head unit models!


- Notice for Facebook users
The Facebook service will remain active until April 30, 2015. After this date, Facebook could not be more functional. This because of the new policy of Facebook, which no longer grants permission to read the home of its members to third parties. Those who have already purchased the single packet of Facebook, will receive in the future access to one or more services to be developed. For the remaining time, Facebook service will be granted free of charge.

- Added DSP service:
Now you can control a powerful external sound processor directly from your AppRadio. Improve your listening experience through the Digital Sound Processor. Require the installation of an external accessory.

- Fixed bug that caused crashes on WebRadio

- Fixed issue with GPS on Maps and WebRadio (for iOS 8)

- Bug on parking brake info fixed
- Minor bugs fixed
Fixed bug on Push Notification for iOS8
Fixed a bug in WebRadio Service

Great changes on this version, now we added supports for offline maps and a powerfull turn by turn navigation system with voice guidance.
You can search an address or a POI in offline mode or one of you contact and start navigation to it without taking care about your internet connection.
Offline maps and POI search are included into Place, Entry and Advanced package.
Turn by Turn navigation requests to buy the specific InApp purchase package (it includes Offline Maps as well).

*********WARNING***********************
It's strongly suggested to use IOS devices from iPhone5 or later for Appradio ONE/USB Users
It requests IOS 8 or later
*******************************************

- Improved mix of navigator's voice and players of Spotify and SoundCloud.
- Enabled YouTube and iPod Video on AppRadio One systems. Warning!!! AppRadio One does not support any video, for this reason will only be played audio tracks.
- Fixed minor bugs on Spotify, SoundCloud and Weather
Minor bugs fixed
Now EC Touch is compatible with iOS9

UI improvements
Now you can add up to 5 cities to Weather Service
Bug fixing

Compatibility with iOS 10.
Turn by turn navigation: now fuel stations and parkings are shown during trip
iPod: fixed bug in iOS 10
Now you can control Phoenix Gold DSP 8.8 directly from your Head Unit
Minor bug fixed
Bug fixing
Now compatible with iOS 10.3
Updated weather forecast provider
YouTube bug fixing

EC Touch now is compatible with iOS 11
Fixed black screen issue when connected with some model of Pioneer's Head Unit
Fixed bug on Twitter for iOS 11 users
Now compatible with iOS 11.4
Fixed a bug on map routing
Fixed issue in Twitter login
